name: SetGithubRunnerGroupRepoAccess
description:
Update repository access for a GitHub runner group.

Replaces the list of repositories that can access a self-hosted runner group in a GitHub organization. Requires authentication with an access token having the `admin:org` scope.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub organization. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: runner_group_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the self-hosted runner group in the organization.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner group.

parameters.name: repository_ids_for_access
parameters.description: List of repository IDs allowed to access the self-hosted runner group.

value_schema.description: List of repository IDs that can access the runner group.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: runner_group_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner group.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner group.

parameters.name: selected_repository_ids
parameters.description: List of repository IDs that can access the runner group.

value_schema.description: List of repository IDs that can access the runner group.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
